description: This file defines the 'Note' entity class for a notes management backend. It uses JPA annotations to map the class to a database table, with fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with lifecycle methods to handle timestamp management.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class representing a note with fields for id, title, content, creation and update timestamps. It is annotated for JPA persistence and manages timestamps via lifecycle callbacks.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Default constructor for the Note class.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to create a Note with specified id, title, and content. Generates a new UUID if id is null.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method annotated with @PrePersist, sets createdAt and updatedAt to current timestamp, and assigns UUID if id is null.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle method annotated with @PreUpdate, updates the updatedAt timestamp to current time.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Getter for the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Setter for the content of the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Getter for the timestamp when the note was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Getter for the timestamp when the note was last updated.
